Depending on your pace, Portal is about three or four hours long. Say you were to rank video games by ranking how much innovation and fun they pack in per hour. By this measure (and a number of others), Portal is the best game of all time. It's not very replayable, but such is the nature of the beast with puzzle games.
El juego tiene mecanicas muy interesantes y divertidas. Muy recomendable comprarlo por lo que vale, y más si esta de oferta (Ya sea en el Portal Bundle Pack o el Valve Complete Pack).
one of the best games ever

真不错，07年的游戏能做成这样是我没想到的，三个小时通过，最后一关超级好玩，中间也有很多考验技术和操作的关卡，大促才7块，还在观望的可以无脑冲了，绝对不会后悔的

Holy Crap, love this game man. If I could, I could end up writing 17 paragraphs on this game but I wont so I will keep it short. First of all, for a 2007 game it is very amazing and is easily one of the best games I have played. It may be a short game but the deep secret story behind it is amazing and the mechanics are so fun. I loved playing around with the Portals and AHH it is amazing. After completing the main 19 levels, you still have 6 extra levels that are very fun plus challenges. The portal mechanics though are crazy, shoot a portal there and come out here and it just sets up a fun time. 10/10 game.
Awesome game, just wish it was longer.

This is the beautiful beginning to a beautiful series. Although it can't really be called a series, can it? CAN IT?! COUNTING TO THREE IS NOT THAT HARD, VALVE!
